data.title: Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity
data.meta_description: Cannes Lions, a five-day International Festival of Creativity, is the largest gathering in the creative marketing community. Find out all about Cannes Lions, here.
data.text:
The Cannes Lion Awards are the cornerstone of the Festival and the industry benchmark of creative excellence. 2024 winners and shortlists can be viewed on The Work. Congratulations to everyone awarded and our appreciation to our jury presidents, jurors, entrants and all who took part in the Festival. See you in 2025!

Take a look at the stellar lineup of talent who took to the stage at Cannes Lions 2024. Sharing inspiring, provocative voices – both legendary and new – from around the world, sharing ideas that advance industries, shape the world and drive progress through creativity.

Our Festival partners are an integral part of the Festival landscape bringing immersive experiences, activations, networking and talent initiatives to the beaches, cabanas and other vibrant Festival spaces.

We’re here for everyone in the making – and we’re dedicated to creating opportunities, providing access and nurturing the next generation of creative marketing leaders. From our Young Lions and Student Passes to our See It Be It and new ERA programme, there's a multitude of career-elevating ways for up-and-coming talent to experience the Festival.
